title: Duntroon [Short version]: the Royal Military College of Australia
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia - Armed forces
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Royal Military College (Duntroon, A.C.T.)
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Armed forces - training
description: An account of the training of cadet officers at Australia's military college, Duntroon. In the academic field there are three courses open - general science, engineering, and arts. Duntroon has become famous for its parade ground efficiency and its traditions of loyalty, efficiency and responsibility. Narrated by Keith Eden and photography by Arthur Brown.
